channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump ‘failed to consider the harms’ on SNAP benefits by withholding food aid during shutdown, judge rules
item.description: Find the money to fully fund SNAP benefits for November, the judge told the White House, which promptly appealed.

item.title: ‘They ain’t worried about the miners or people in West Virginia or coal miners anywhere’: Black lung sufferers despair over DC’s distance
item.description: The two reddest states in America — Wyoming and West Virginia — had the highest overall worker death rates in 2023, according to government figures.

item.title: Zohran Mamdani visits Puerto Rico for annual NYC political power broker summit
item.description: The conference is something of a post-Election Day retreat for the state’s political movers and shakers at a Hilton hotel in San Juan.

item.title: Trump cozies up to Central Asian leaders in hunt for rare earths resources
item.description: Trump and the officials from Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan and Uzbekistan held bilateral meetings in the Oval Office.

item.title: ‘You can’t expect people to go in to work when they’re not getting a paycheck’: Travelers sympathize despite 800 downed Friday flights
item.description: The 40 airports selected for the slowdown span over two dozen states and include hubs such as Atlanta, Dallas, Denver, LA and Charlotte.

item.title: FAA cuts may snarl airports this weekend. What to do if you have to travel.
A silver lining for Wendy’s as it loses ground to fast-food rivals
